episode.title: Estes v. Metropolitan Branches of Dallas National Association for the Advancement of Colored People

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 78-253, Estes against Metropolitan Branches of Dallas NAACP, and two consolidated cases.
The writs of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit in each of these cases are dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice Powell joined with Mr. Justice Stewart and Mr. Justice Rehnquist in dissenting.
